channel.title: Voice commands for debian host
channel.description:
I would like to have voice commands, mainly for the purpose of executing a quick "no hands" shutdown.
This is for the host, not a whonix issue.
I only found https://www.noobslab.com/2014/06/control-your-ubuntulinux-mint-system.html , nothing in Debian.

item.title: Voice commands for debian host
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
There is KDE Simon and Gnome-voice-control but non are in Debian repos.

Read full topic
